casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Kristan L. PETERS-HAMLIN. No. D-2897. Supreme Court of the United States May 16, 2016.

Kristan L. Peters-Hamlin, of Westport, Connecticut, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring her to show cause why she should not be *2054disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
